Posts.EditableText: Right after I posted on the forums my game refreshed and now it says "invalid game id" any time I try to load it. I'm about to cry, I have so much work saved in that freaking game. Please help. Edit: The game will come up now, but the game title says "undefined" and sticks on a permanent "loading..." screen.
